		                    Stage III Nasopharyngeal Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage III nasopharyngeal cancer may include the following:         -  Chemotherapy given with radiation therapy, which may be followed by more chemotherapy.    - Radiation therapy.    - Radiation therapy followed by surgery to remove cancer -containi
